title: Where is Melania Trump? Former first lady's elusive presence on US 2024 campaign trail sparks curiosity
content: Former First Lady Melania Trump's absence from key events in her husband's 2024 campaign has sparked media speculation. Her minimal public appearances and absence during Donald Trump's hush money trial have raised questions about her role. Historian Katherine Jellison noted Melania's unconventional approach, contrasting her with other political spouses.
summary: Former First Lady Melania Trump's absence from key events in her husband's 2024 campaign has sparked media speculation. Her minimal public appearances and absence during Donald Trump's hush money trial have raised questions about her role. Historian Katherine Jellison noted Melania's unconventional approach, contrasting her with other political spouses.

Royal reconciliation: King Charles considering visit to America to mend relationship with Prince Harry
content: The father and son have been taking small steps towards reconciliation, including a reunion in London earlier this year. Royal author Tom Quinn has suggested that Charles has discussed the possibility of visiting America to see Harry, Meghan Markle, and their children, Prince Archie and Princess Lilibet.
summary: The father and son have been taking small steps towards reconciliation, including a reunion in London earlier this year. Royal author Tom Quinn has suggested that Charles has discussed the possibility of visiting America to see Harry, Meghan Markle, and their children, Prince Archie and Princess Lilibet.

title: Abortion rights advocate raped by stepfather joins Jill Biden's campaign
content: ​​Duvall became an advocate after being raped by her stepfather at the age of 12, which resulted in a pregnancy and miscarriage. Her stepfather was convicted of rape and is currently serving time in prison.
summary: ​​Duvall became an advocate after being raped by her stepfather at the age of 12, which resulted in a pregnancy and miscarriage. Her stepfather was convicted of rape and is currently serving time in prison.

Ukrainian drones and missiles kill 4 in Russia and Crimea, fresh bombing of Kharkiv leaves 1 dead
content: Four people died and over 100 were wounded in Ukrainian drone and missile attacks, with one person killed in Russia's aerial bombing of Kharkiv.
summary: Four people died and over 100 were wounded in Ukrainian drone and missile attacks, with one person killed in Russia's aerial bombing of Kharkiv.

title: Flooding wreaks havoc in Iowa while most of US sizzles in heat
